definition: near in time or place or relationship, marked by fidelity to an original, the concluding part of any performance, to finish a game in baseball by protecting a lead

adverb

= synonyms: near

= example: in an attentive manner
= synonyms: tight
adjective

= example: marked by fidelity to an original

- rigorously attentive
- not far distant in time or space or degree or circumstances

= example: at or within a short distance in space or time or having elements near each other

= example: close in relevance or relationship

- used of hair or haircuts

noun

verb
